full_summary:
### Inspection, Testing and Maintenance Services for Emergency Generators & Transfer Switches

#### Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number**: PW-23-01026317

**Solicitation Number**: KN229902_77400SC

**Publication Date**: February 17, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: March 14, 2023, 14:00:00

#### Description

Defense Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking contractor(s) to provide Inspection, Testing, Maintenance and Minor Repair (ITM) services for the Department's Emergency Generator Systems and associated Transfer Switch gear located at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Kingston.

#### Scope of Work

The work includes:

* Supply of labor, materials, supervision and equipment necessary to undertake the ITM of Emergency Generator Systems and associated Transfer Switch gear
* Completion of security-restricted tasks as identified in the Tender Documents

#### Security Clearance

The selected contractor must hold a valid Facility Security Clearance at the SECRET level, issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD) within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).

#### Tender Requirements

* Estimated cost: $2,800,000.00
* Completion deadline: March 31, 2026
* Complies with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (GPA)

#### Tender Documents

All tender documents for this opportunity may be ordered from MERX. Amendments to the tender documents should be obtained from MERX; amendments from other sources may not be up-to-date.

#### Contact Information

For inquiries, please contact:

#### Bidding Requirements

* Bidders who contact anyone other than the DCC Contracting Authority to obtain clarifications during the solicitation period may be disqualified.
* Bidders can obtain contract award results from the DCC website at Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada (dcc-cdc.gc.ca).

#### Notice

This procurement is open to qualified bidders. The preliminary tender results for this project will be available on MERX.  Note that only the DCC Contracting Authority may validate bidder inquiries.
